Title: The Crimson Rivers
Writer: Jean-Christophe Grangé (novel), Jean-Christophe Grangé (screenplay), Mathieu Kassovitz (screenplay)
Actors: Jean Reno, Vincent Cassel, Nadia Farès, Dominique Sanda
Plot: A murder detective must follow the footsteps of a brutal killer within the secrets of a classist college.
Production: TF1 Films Productions, Le Studio Canal +, Légende Entreprises, Gaumont
